scripts.test: pnpm --filter obsidian-plugin test && pnpm --filter cloudflare-worker test
scripts.test:run: pnpm --filter obsidian-plugin test:run && pnpm --filter cloudflare-worker test:run
scripts.test:coverage: pnpm --filter obsidian-plugin test:coverage && pnpm --filter cloudflare-worker test:coverage
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.release:patch: pnpm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: pnpm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: pnpm version major && git push && git push --tags
